issue.title: [C++][Dataset] Support URI-decoding partition keys
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14737](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14737). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
From [GitHub issue #11718](https://github.com/apache/arrow/issues/11718), Delta Lake can URL-encode partition keys. We should add an option as we did in ARROW-12644 to decode them as well.
